Package services

Class ReplenishmentService

java.lang.Object
services.ReplenishmentService
public class ReplenishmentService extends Object
Service class for managing replenishment requests in the healthcare system.

This class provides functionality to create, retrieve, approve, and reject replenishment requests, and handles the persistence of these requests in a CSV file.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReplenishmentService

      public ReplenishmentService()
      Constructor for `ReplenishmentService`.

      Ensures that the replenishment requests CSV file exists when the service is initialized.

  • Method Details

    • createReplenishmentRequest

      public List<ReplenishmentRequest> createReplenishmentRequest(List<String> medicines)
      Creates new replenishment requests for the provided list of medicines.

      Skips medicines that already have pending requests. Writes new requests to the CSV file.

      Parameters:
      medicines - List of medicines for which replenishment requests need to be created.
      Returns:
      A list of newly created `ReplenishmentRequest` objects.

    • getAllRequests

      public List<ReplenishmentRequest> getAllRequests()
      Retrieves all replenishment requests from the CSV file.

      Reads the file, skipping the header line, and parses each row into a `ReplenishmentRequest` object.

      Returns:
      A list of all `ReplenishmentRequest` objects stored in the CSV file.

    • getRequestsByStatus

      public List<ReplenishmentRequest> getRequestsByStatus(StatusEnum status)
      Retrieves replenishment requests by their status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to filter requests by.
      Returns:
      A list of `ReplenishmentRequest` objects matching the specified status.

    • approveRequest

      public List<String> approveRequest(String requestId)
      Approves a replenishment request by changing its status to `APPROVED`.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the replenishment request to approve.
      Returns:
      The name of the medicine in the approved request, or `null` if not found.

    • rejectRequest

      public boolean rejectRequest(String requestId)
      Rejects a replenishment request by changing its status to `REJECTED`.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the replenishment request to reject.
      Returns:
      `true` if the request was successfully rejected; otherwise, `false`.

    • updateRequestStatus

      public boolean updateRequestStatus(String requestId, StatusEnum newStatus)
      Updates the status of a specific replenishment request by its ID.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the request to update.
      newStatus - The new status to set.
      Returns:
      `true` if the status was successfully updated; otherwise, `false`.
